chunks.chunk_text: John, where's your brother?How about going swimming?Sure, the music was great.I like jogging, hiking and dancing.I still have ten more minutes to play.Excuse me, is this seat taken?歡迎收聽騎兵老師的超級英語通Welcome to English All Pass with Kenneth Chee
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 英語說得通困難的決定Talk about a difficult decision that you made in your life..json

chunks.chunk_text: Hello everyone, welcome to English All Pass.My name is Kenneth Chee.歡迎收聽口說英語通。我是騎兵老師。In this unit, we are going to talk about a difficult decision.在這個單元裡面呢,我們要來練習說說一個困難的決定。首先,那我們就來聽一下這個單元的問題,以及我們的回答。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 英語說得通困難的決定Talk about a difficult decision that you made in your life..json

chunks.chunk_text: Question, talk about a difficult decision that you made in your life.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 英語說得通困難的決定Talk about a difficult decision that you made in your life..json

chunks.chunk_text: Of course, it's a good opportunity to see the world, to experience different style education, and to improve my language skills.But then, being in a new place means I would be all on my own.And what if I didn't get used to the life there and didn't make any friends?Though these might sound terrifying, I really don't want to miss the great chance to broaden my horizons, so I made up my mind to study abroad.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 英語說得通困難的決定Talk about a difficult decision that you made in your life..json

chunks.chunk_text: 這個單元我們的問題是Talk about a difficult decision that you made in your life.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 英語說得通困難的決定Talk about a difficult decision that you made in your life..json

chunks.chunk_text: Well, the most difficult decision I've ever made was whether or not I should study abroad.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 英語說得通困難的決定Talk about a difficult decision that you made in your life..json

chunks.chunk_text: 後面呢,就接著說了。For someone who had never been far away from home, studying in a foreign country might not be easy.對於某個從來沒有離家很遠的人。這邊呢,你看他用的是had never been。我們用的是過去完成式,表示比過去更早,那就是之前我都沒有離開過家。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 英語說得通困難的決定Talk about a difficult decision that you made in your life..json

chunks.chunk_text: 這個慣用語表示的是正反面的意見。接著下面一段說
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 英語說得通困難的決定Talk about a difficult decision that you made in your life..json

chunks.chunk_text: 這邊說,我一直以來都想要做什麼事。這邊用的是現在完成式,表示是一直以來我都很想要出國讀書。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 英語說得通困難的決定Talk about a difficult decision that you made in your life..json

chunks.chunk_text: 而且呢,還可以強化我的語言技巧。聽起來很棒吧?他說呢,這個地方我們用的是動名詞being來當主詞,就是在一個新的地方。就代表著
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 英語說得通困難的決定Talk about a difficult decision that you made in your life..json

chunks.chunk_text: 這是萬一的舉行。他後面呢,就會加上過去式字句,表示的是與現在事實相反的假設。所以他說萬一我不習慣,那邊的生活怎麼辦呢?
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 英語說得通困難的決定Talk about a difficult decision that you made in your life..json

chunks.chunk_text: 後面,沒有交到朋友。最後面就說啦,這句子有點長囉。一開始說,儘管呢,這些聽起來很嚇人。是一個形容詞,就是嚇人的意思。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 英語說得通困難的決定Talk about a difficult decision that you made in your life..json

chunks.chunk_text: 我呢,可是一點都不想錯過這個很棒的機會。後面,這是一個慣用語,意思是開闊某人的視野。那麼要小心horizons,這個字在這個片語裡面要用的是複數。所以最後呢,我下定決心,出國讀書。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 英語說得通困難的決定Talk about a difficult decision that you made in your life..json

chunks.chunk_text: 第一個句型,我們要來練習的是。我曾經做過最困難的決定就是。那這邊呢,當然就是最困難的決定。後面呢,跟著一個關西代名詞子句。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 英語說得通困難的決定Talk about a difficult decision that you made in your life..json

chunks.chunk_text: 不過講話的時候呢,我們就把that給省略掉。所以原來是我曾經做過的最困難的決定。所以呢,下次你只要講我曾經做過最困難的決定,就可以講。我們看一下例句。他說我曾經做過最困難的決定,就是離開。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 英語說得通困難的決定Talk about a difficult decision that you made in your life..json

chunks.chunk_text: 第二個句型。這邊的have wanted,用的是現在完成式。表示是從過去到現在就是一直以來。那麼中間我們又放了一個always,頻率複詞。表示的是總是一直。所以呢就是一直以來我都很想做什麼事。來看一下例句。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 英語說得通困難的決定Talk about a difficult decision that you made in your life..json

chunks.chunk_text: 我一直想要約你出去。下次呢,你遇到喜歡的人,你就可以說。第三個。這可是一個做什麼很好的機會。就是一個名詞,叫做機會的意思。看一下例句。這可是展現你領導才能的好機會。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 英語說得通困難的決定Talk about a difficult decision that you made in your life..json

chunks.chunk_text: demonstrate是一個動詞,就是展示。而leadership是一個名詞,就是領導才能。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 英語說得通困難的決定Talk about a difficult decision that you made in your life..json

chunks.chunk_text: 形容詞,外國的,陌生的。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 英語說得通困難的決定Talk about a difficult decision that you made in your life..json

chunks.chunk_text: 形容詞,可怕的。broaden wants horizons,偏於開闊某人的視野。今天這個單元我們討論的是,你人生中曾經做過最困難的決定。希望呢,您都學會囉。OK, that's all for this unit.最後請記得,每日十分鐘讓您變成英語通。我是奇兵老師。Until then, see you next time.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 英語說得通困難的決定Talk about a difficult decision that you made in your life..json
